titleStmt.title: A briefe discouery of the damages that happen to this realme by disordered and vnlawfull diet The benefites and commodities that otherwaies might ensue. With a perswasion of the people: for a better maintenance to the nauie. Brieflie compiled, by Edward Ieninges.
titleStmt.author: Jeninges, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Roger Ward, dwelling vpon Lambart Hill, neere old Fish-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
